name: SUV Car Simulator Extreme 2 Free
description:
New version of your favorite SUV Drive 3D 4x4 game!
- Great realtime 3D graphics;
- Lot of different SUV cars to choose;
- Easy-to-use arrows controls;
- 4x4 car drive physics;
- Improved: camera views, 4x4 car physics, graphics, perfomance;

Collect coins, avoid mines and complete level tasks within limited time!
